content.1: And Moses called all Israel, and said unto them, Hear, O Israel, the statutes and judgments which I speak in your ears this day, that ye may learn them, and keep, and do them.
content.7: Thou shalt have none other gods before me.

content.10: And shewing mercy unto thousands of them that love me and keep my commandments.

content.13: Six days thou shalt labour, and do all thy work:
content.15: And remember that thou wast a servant in the land of Egypt, and

content.20: Neither shalt thou bear false witness against thy neighbour.
content.21: Neither shalt thou desire thy neighbour’s wife, neither shalt thou covet thy neighbour’s house, his field, or his manservant, or his maidservant, his ox, or his ass, or any
content.23: And it came to pass, when ye heard the voice out of the midst of the darkness, (for the mountain did burn with fire,) that ye came near unto me,

content.29: O that there were such an heart in them, that they would fear me, and keep all my commandments always, that it might be well with them, and with their children for ever!
content.30: Go say to them, Get you into your tents again.
content.31: But as for thee, stand thou here by me, and I will speak unto thee all the commandments, and the statutes, and the judgments, which thou shalt teach them, that they may do
